dublin_core.dcvalue: Due to its perception as a disease of development road traffic accident and related injuries tend to be under recognized as a major health problem in developing countries However majority of the world s fatalities on the roads occur in low income and middle income countries Since the main cause of road traffic accident is attributed to human risky behaviors it is important to identify significant factors for risky behaviors of drivers
Risky driving behaviors for road traffic accident among drivers in Mekele city, Northern Ethiopia.
